name: Haunter
author: Midori Harada
flavor_text: It licks with its gaseous tongue to steal the victim’s life force. It lurks in darkness for prey.

abilities.name: Gothic Fear
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may leave both Active Pokémon Confused.

attacks.name: Poison Ring
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. That Pokémon can’t retreat during your opponent’s next turn.
